description: This file contains Python code that programmatically generates C++ source code for JSON-RPC event and method registration, including code templates for registering and unregistering RPC methods, handling events, and generating versioning information. It appears to be a code generator script that outputs source code based on schema definitions.

classes.name: AppendTest
classes.description: A class imported from class_emitter module, likely used for appending tests or validations within code generation functions.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for emitting a JSON-RPC event, constructing function prototypes, handling parameters, and conditional logic for sending events, including legacy support.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Outputs the initial boilerplate code for the generated RPC source file, including includes, namespace declarations, and versioning.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Outputs the closing boilerplate code, including unindenting namespaces.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function assembling the registration of methods, properties, events, including generating prototypes and handling event status listeners.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: High-level function to generate the full RPC source code, including boilerplate and main registration logic.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Outputs versioning code along with boilerplate code for a specific RPC interface.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
